thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com | 2 of 15
thread.title: lisa
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by lisa

author: lisa
title: lisa
text: This was my first vacation out of the country. I told Costa Rican Vacations what we wanted and they put together and amazing package. the hotels were really nice. The drivers were very knowledgeable and friendly. The companies that provided the activities were very friendly and made sure we were enjoying ourselves. I will definitely use this company again to plan our next trip.
